state_analysis: The attempts to start Nginx in the foreground have consistently timed out, indicating that it is not able to start due to underlying system restrictions. The policy-rc.d issue appears persistent, preventing any normal startup process for Nginx.
explanation: Given the issues with starting Nginx, I will try to run it directly in a way that bypasses the usual service management. I'll execute the Nginx binary directly with the configuration file specified to see if it can run without interference from systemd or policy-rc.d restrictions.
